item.title: üçë How to Use Emoji
item.description:
This article mainly introduces the use of Emoji in the Hugo framework, adding cute emoji to your blog posts.

Method to realize

Displaying Emoji in the article can directly call the emojify function and use the [Inline Shortcodes](https://gohugo.io/templates/shortcode-templates/#inline- shortcodes) function implementation.

p.s.: After opening InlineShortcodes, it will have many powerful functions, such as inserting YouTube videos, etc.

Here is just a chance to enjoy Jinyoung’s “Dive” with you~~

Detailed Method

If you need to use it globally, you need to put “config.toml, config.yaml, or config.json” in the root directory of the website (according to the specific situation, my file is config.toml, so the following code is also modified by the .toml file For example. For the modification method of other files, please refer to the content in the Inline Shortcodes link above) Add two lines of code to the file:

enableInlineShortcodes = true
enableEmoji = true

In this way, emoji can be used directly in the website. After entering the code corresponding to emoji, the effect is as follows:

I ‚ù§Ô∏è Coding. üå¥üìéüîÆ‚òÇÔ∏èüçë‚òÅÔ∏è‚òÅÔ∏è‚ùÑÔ∏èüìåüçÑ‚ùï

Emoji Code

Please see Emoji cheatsheet at: Emoji cheat sheet .

In addition, you can also paste the corresponding emoji directly from other places, and you can display it anywhere on the blog.

üçë

item.title: üçë Markdown Syntax
item.description:
This article lists the markdown grammar rules in Hugo files in detail, and you can start blogging happily after you learn it.

Header

The following six HTML <h1>‚Äî<h6> elements represent six levels of section headings. <h1> is the highest, <h6> is the lowest.

Level 1 heading

Level 2 heading

Level 3 heading

Level 4 heading

Level 5 heading
Level 6 heading

Paragraph

They just sit in front of TVs and computers and watch all the information and entertainment spread there until they die, living aimlessly like this. Whether eating or taking a bath, working or falling in love, it’s all just done. They pass the time unconsciously, but still lament how short life is. They live off free entertainment, accompanied by television and the Internet. A wealth of information and a monotonous life can only generate arbitrary ideas and hatred. ‚Äî‚Äî“The Demon King” Kotaro Isaka

Citation

The “citing” element represents content cited from another source, optionally within a footer or cite element, and can also be changed inline with notes and abbreviations.

Blockquote without attribution

A wealth of information and a monotonous life can only generate arbitrary ideas and hatred. NOTE You can also use Markdown syntax rules inside quotes.

Blockquote with attribution

A wealth of information and a monotonous life can only generate arbitrary ideas and hatred.

‚Äî “Demon King” Kotaro Isaka1

Form

Tables are not part of the core Markdown specification, but Hugo supports the use of this syntax.

Let‚Äôs represent the boolean values of OR syntax in tabular form:

OR TRUE FALSE
TRUE TRUE TRUE
FALSE TRUE FALSE

Use Markdown Inside Form

Use¬†¬†¬† Markdown ¬†¬†¬† Inside ¬†¬†¬† Form
italic bold delete¬†¬†¬† code

Code Block

Code Block Using Backticks 

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Example HTML5 Document</title>
</head>
<body>
  <p>Test</p>
</body>
</html>

Code block indented by four spaces

(i.e. press Tab twice)

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>Example HTML5 Document</title>
</head>
<body>
  <p>Test</p>
</body>
</html>

Code blocks with Hugo internal highlighting shortcodes 

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Example HTML5 Document</title>
</head>
<body>
  <p>Test</p>
</body>
</html>

List type

Ordered List

  1. Eat well
  2. Study well
  3. Play well

Unordered List

  • Tech
  • Law
  • Lingo

Insert Pic

First put the picture into the static directory, then enter: ![xxx](/1.png), you can get a complete picture~

Other elements ‚Äî abbreviation (abbr), subscript (sub), superscript (sup), shortcut (kbd), highlight (mark)

Except the abbreviation is: <abbr title="">xxx</abbr>, Others can be wrapped with the corresponding abbreviation <sub></sbu>.

abbr

yyds Ë°®Á§∫‚ÄúÊ∞∏ÈÅ†ÁöÑÁ•û‚Äù.

sub

H2O

sup

Xn + Yn = Zn

kbd

Press CTRL+W at the same time (press it after you finish reading)„ÄÇ

mark

Congratulation! You have learned all the markdown syntax and you can close this page~

  1. Isaka Kotaro is a novelist who graduated from Tohoku University Law School in Japan Douban „ÄÇ ↩︎

item.title: üçë How to Build Your Blog using Hugo
item.description:
Hugo is written by Go Language and can help us build a beautiful blog in a very short time„ÄÇ

Install Hugo

MAC 

brew install hugo
hugo version

WIN

  1. Download corresponding .zip document in the hugo release page
  2. unzip hugo.exe file and put it into D:\Software\hugo(You can choose your own path)
  3. add the above into path
    • Right click my computer
    • Attributes
    • Advanced system settings
    • environment variables
    • double click path
    • new path
  4. Restart the terminal, run hugo version. The version number indicates success.

Build a Blog

Enter hugo official websiteÔºàhttps://gohugo.io/getting-started/quick-start/Ôºâ, follow the steps to build it step by step.

NoticeÔºö

hugo new site quickstart

The quickstart need to be changed into your github repository name and add -generator.

Create a New Terminal

  1. Run hugo in the terminal (generate the public folder); you can also use hugo -F --cleanDestinationDir (generate a new folder)
  2. Create a new .gitignore on the outermost side and enter:

/public/
which means ignore my public, it will become a new folder alone.

  1. cd public
  2. git init
  3. git add .
  4. git remote add origin git@github.com:[your user name]]/[your user name].github.io.git
  5. git branch -M main
  6. git push -u origin main

Create the Second Article

  1. Run hugo new posts/the Second Article.md in xxx.github.io-creator (Make sure you are not in public )
  2. Run code posts/the Second Article.md to edit the file. Make sure not the delete the original content and write in another line to input your content.
  3. Run hugo -D to get the new public
  4. Enter public for next step
    1. git add . (Don’t forget the .)
    2. git commit -m update
    3. git push -f (Force upload)
  5. Wait a few minutes for a second post to appear on your blog!

Upload Pic

Method1

  1. Open the sm.ms website, upload the picture, and get the url of the picture.
  2. Use ![](url) to show the pic in your article.

Method2

  1. Store the image file 1.png in the static directory and get static/1.png
  2. Write ![](/1.png) in the blog Markdown to see the image corresponding to static/1.png
  3. If you want to create an images directory in static, just create it directly, and add /images in front of the corresponding image, for example
    1. Put the image file 2.png in the static/images directory to get static/images/2.png
    2. Just write ![](/images/2.png) in the blog

In addition, you can also Google “Hugo insert picture” to find the answer.

Beside Coding, as a very open-minded person, I have the following interests and habits:

item.title: Self Introduction
item.description:
üÜîHi, This is Yuka. I’ve learn law for five years and practiced as an Intellectual Lawyer for three years. I’ve always have interests on high-tech and new technology. My passion lies on language studies and “programming language” is a language full of simplicity.

üíª From March 1, 2022 I started teaching myself coding with the encouragement of one of my best friend Phoebe Chu(She is an experienced Fron-end developer of a big company). I feel like I’m improving every day, and this kind of feedback and purposeful learning is really fun.

üìöThe output of learning is very important, so I will share the learning experience in this blog. This blog is also written in traditional Chinese. First, I want to inherit traditional Chinese culture, and second, I hope that although my blog writing uses more complicated fonts, it can express concise and to the point like the ancients.
